section.name: Section 4 - Differentiated Professional Learning
section.summary:
Professional learning should be differentiated, too! Here are three assignments for you to choose from. Find the one that is most challenging and rewarding for you. You need to submit only one assignment.

Teacher reflection is an important way to conduct formative assessment into your own practice. As you do your assignment, consider how often you take the time to reflect on your practice or reflect with a critical friend. Find ways to do it more often!

  

 

Assignments: Choose One
